steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to change the case of.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Font' group, click on the 'Change Case' button.
A drop-down menu will appear with different options for changing the case of the selected text.
Choose the desired case option from the drop-down menu (e.g., 'UPPERCASE', 'lowercase', 'Title Case', etc.).
The selected text will now be changed to the chosen case.
Save the changes to the document.
